greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerators of the convergents of the continued fraction for L(2, chi3), where L(s, chi3) is the Dirichlet L-function for the non-principal character modulo 3.
formula: chi3(k) = Kronecker(-3, k); chi3(k) is 0, 1, -1 when k reduced modulo 3 is 0, 1, 2, respectively; chi3 is A102283.
mathematica: nmax = 100; cfrac = ContinuedFraction[(Zeta[2, 1/3] - Zeta[2, 2/3])/9, nmax + 1]; Join[ {0, 1}, Numerator[ Table[ FromContinuedFraction[ Take[cfrac, j] ], {j, 1, nmax + 1} ] ] ]
results.author: _Stuart Clary_, Dec 17 2008
